con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:servicioswsdl" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="urn:servicioswsdl" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:servicioswsdl"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="consultaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="consultaServiciosResponse"> <part name="return" type="SOAP-ENC:Array"/> </message> <message name="bajaServiciosRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="mcorta" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="bajaServiciosResponse"> <part name="return" type="SOAP-ENC:Array"/> </message> <message name="listaNegraRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="accion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="listaNegraResponse"> <part name="return" type="SOAP-ENC:Array"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioRequest"> <part name="movil" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="servicio" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="marcacion" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="pass" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="altaServicioResponse"> <part name="return" type="SOAP-ENC:Array"/> </message> <portType name="serviciosPortType"> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <documentation>Devuelve informacion de cada servicio que se presta al consumidor</documentation> <input message="tns:consultaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:consultaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <documentation>Elimina el servicio del consumidor</documentation> <input message="tns:bajaServiciosRequest"/> <output message="tns:bajaServiciosResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="listaNegra"> <documentation>Elimina o agrega un movil de la lista negra</documentation> <input message="tns:listaNegraRequest"/> <output message="tns:listaNegraResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <documentation>Agrega al usuario a la suscripcion solicitada</documentation> <input message="tns:altaServicioRequest"/> <output message="tns:altaServicioResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="serviciosBinding" type="tns:serviciosPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="consultaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:consultaservicioswsdl#consultaservicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:consultaservicioswsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:consultaservicioswsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="bajaServicios"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:BajaServicioswsdl#bajaServicios" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:BajaServicioswsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:BajaServicioswsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="listaNegra"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:ListaNegrawsdl#ListaNegra" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:ListaNegrawsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:ListaNegrawsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="altaServicio"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:AltaServiciowsdl#AltaServicio" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:AltaServiciowsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:AltaServiciowsdl" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="servicios"> <port name="serviciosPort" binding="tns:serviciosBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.opratel.com/testing/ws_claro_honduras/ws_claro.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
